Denmark's Queen Margrethe II to abdicate after 52 years on the throneDenmark's Queen Margrethe II will abdicate on January 14 next year after 52 years on the throne and will be succeeded by her eldest son Crown Prince Frederik, she said her annual New Year's speech on Sunday. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 17:27:19 GMT YZWMXN4T5BJS3NKHXTEMZNDCII https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/denmarks-queen-margrethe-ii-abdicate-jan-14-2024-royal-palace-2023-12-31/Jacob Gronholt-Pedersen世界欧洲
UK's Cameron: Iran shares responsibility for preventing Red Sea attacksBritish Foreign Secretary David Cameron said on Sunday he had made clear in a call with Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amirabdollahian that Iran shared responsibility for preventing Houthi attacks in the Red Sea. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 16:58:10 GMT OEF4MRWTIRMQ7DVZD7EDBBHKYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uks-cameron-iran-shares-responsibility-preventing-red-sea-attacks-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中东
Israeli minister repeats call for Palestinians to leave GazaOne of the senior figures in Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's right-wing coalition called on Sunday for Palestinian residents of Gaza to leave the besieged enclave, making way for Israelis who could "make the desert bloom". Sun, 31 Dec 2023 16:47:58 GMT JMWGM6FBLBKUDNI4L76GMOKN5U https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-minister-repeats-call-palestinians-leave-gaza-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中东
Armed drone shot down near US base in northern IraqDefence systems shot down an armed drone on Sunday over Erbil airport in northern Iraq where U.S. and other international forces are stationed, Iraqi Kurdistan's counter-terrorism service said in a statement. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 16:38:38 GMT WEFSMFYZINNALPDBHRYO6FVI24 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/armed-drone-shot-down-near-us-base-northern-iraq-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中东
Israeli indicted for impersonating soldier, stealing weaponsIsraeli prosecutors filed criminal charges on Sunday against a man accused of impersonating a soldier to join the Gaza war, of stealing munitions and, according to media, of posing for a frontline picture with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 16:35:56 GMT ZG5MYXI2JFL4BGR6EUAIAISVSE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-indicted-impersonating-soldier-stealing-weapons-gaza-war-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中东
Gazans pray new year can bring peace after 'wreckage'As they turn from a year that could barely have brought more bitter hardship after 12 weeks of a pulverising Israeli assault, people in Gaza have little hope that 2024 will bring much relief. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 16:19:21 GMT PMYPLCPBT5N4LFFJZH3ODDUSWE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/gazans-pray-new-year-can-bring-peace-after-wreckage-2023-2023-12-31/Saleh Salem, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa世界欧洲
UN peacekeeping mission in Mali completes its withdrawalThe U.N. peacekeeping mission in Mali, MINUSMA, is poised to complete its withdrawal from the country on Sunday, the United Nations said in a statement. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 16:04:05 GMT FAHV7SFBNJKYDA2ROGYKHBI3GQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/un-peacekeeping-mission-mali-completes-its-withdrawal-2023-12-31/Reuters世界非洲
Brazil unveils tax benefits for firms to boost investmentsBrazil's Vice President Geraldo Alckmin on Sunday unveiled government measures aimed at providing companies with tax benefits so they can buy new machinery and invest in transportation. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 15:48:24 GMT IJNAYZPVL5PW3H2RFRCMFNCIEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-unveils-tax-benefits-firms-boost-investments-2023-12-31/Reuters世界美洲
World starts welcoming New Year with fireworks, prayers and some stark wordsNew Zealanders were among the first in the world to celebrate the arrival of 2024 with a fireworks display in Auckland on Monday. The fireworks illuminated the cloudy night sky and were accompanied by a laser light and animation show. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 15:21:04 GMT RWN3APH3PBJKLNME7FPKYX2KLI https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/world-starts-welcoming-new-year-with-fireworks-prayers-some-stark-words-2023-12-31/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Putin makes passing Ukraine reference in New Year's Eve addressRussian President Vladimir Putin, facing an election in March, made only passing reference in his New Year address on Sunday to his war in Ukraine, hailing his soldiers as heroes but mostly emphasising unity and shared determination. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 14:21:57 GMT JNWGOU3YF5JFNKSXBO5WKDXSXA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-new-year-address-makes-only-passing-reference-ukraine-2023-12-31/Reuters世界欧洲
Benedict would have banned same-sex blessings, aide says on anniversaryThe Vatican marked the first anniversary on Sunday of the death of Pope Benedict XVI, with one of his closest aides saying he never would have approved a recent declaration allowing Catholic priests to bless same-sex couples. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 13:47:41 GMT MVUHADVVPZL4LIBAHLIT2EHEJM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/benedict-would-have-banned-same-sex-blessings-aide-says-anniversary-2023-12-31/Philip Pullella世界欧洲
